tool_description: Analyzes forecast data to generate weather alerts and warnings based on predefined thresholds and hazardous condition detection.

alert_severity.description: Minimum alert level to generate: advisory, watch, warning

error_messages: Data mismatch: forecast_data length must match the number of variable_types provided.
Invalid alert severity: Use one of [advisory, watch, warning].
Unsupported variable: Variable types must be standard weather parameters like temperature, wind, precipitation.
Insufficient data: Need at least 1 forecast data point to generate alerts.
usage: Provide forecast_data with corresponding variable_types and location_name. Optionally set minimum alert_severity threshold. Returns generated weather alerts and warnings.

alerts_generated.description: List of weather alerts and warnings

affected_periods.description: Time periods when alerts are valid
